title: TO_DATETIME
description: Converts a string representing a Datetime into a Datetime. If the string cannot be converted, an error is thrown.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The string to convert into a Datetime, provided in a recognized date/time format

examples:
TO_DATETIME("2002-10-09T19:00:00Z")
-- Returns a DateTime value corresponding to October 9, 2002 at 7:00 PM UTC

tips.text: Returns null immediately for blank or null inputs.
If primary parsing fails, falls back to parsing via JSON deserialization.
Throws an ApplicationException if all parsing attempts fail.
